content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine at position (10.0, 0.0)
- Boiler at position (x) (not specified in the logs)
- Offshore pump at position (-9.5, 24.5)

### Copper plate mine at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (x1) (not specified in the logs) and a furnace at position (y1) (not specified in the logs)
- Burner mining drill at position (x2) (not specified in the logs) and a furnace at position (y2) (not specified in the logs)
- Burner mining drill at position (x3) (not specified in the logs) and a furnace at position (y3) (not specified in the logs)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine at position (z1) (not specified in the logs) and inserter at position (a) (not specified in the logs) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace at position y1 to assembling machine at position (z1)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing electric poles
- Ensure that the target location for placing the electric pole is clear of any blocking entities or terrain that is unplaceable (e.g., water).

### Errors when inserting coal into steam engine
- Make sure that the steam engine is within range and can accept coal before attempting to insert.

### Errors when retrieving entities
- Verify the position of the entity you are trying to access. Ensure that the entity exists at the specified coordinates before attempting to get it.
